patthana24.3:4.1: Nahetu nasappaccayo dhammo hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.3:6.1: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:7.1: Nahetu naanidassano dhammo hetussa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.3:7.3: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:8.1: Nahetuṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:9.1: Nahetuṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:9.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.3:10.1: Nahetuṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana24.3:10.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:11.1: Nahetuṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:12.1: Nahetuṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:12.2: Nanahetuṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:12.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.3:13.1: Nahetuṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:14.1: Nahetuṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.3:15.1: Nahetuṃ nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
